original_text: And he spread it before me. And it had writing on the front and on the back, and there were written on it words of lamentation and mourning and woe.
korean_text: 그가 그것을 내 앞에 펴시니 그 안팎에 글이 있는데 그 위에 애가와 애곡과 재앙의 말이 기록되었더라

sentences.original_text: And he spread it before me.
And it had writing on the front and on the back,
and there were written on it
words of lamentation and mourning and woe.
